text: The Busy World of Richard Scarry is an Canadian and French children's animated TV show. It was produced by CINAR Animation (now known as DHX Media, previously Cookie Jar Group), France Animation, & Paramount Television, And With the Participation of Family Channel ICI Radio-Canada Tele, and The Cable Production Fund and it aired on Nickelodeon, France 3, and Canal J It The show was based on the books drawn and written by Richard Scarry. ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (1993)=== ===Season 2 (1994)=== ===Season 3 (1995)=== ===Season 4 (1996)=== ===Season 5 (1997)=== == Other websites == * The Busy World of Richard Scarry at Cookie Jar Entertainment * * Category:1990s American animated television series Category:1990s American children's television series Category:Canadian animated television series Category:1990s French television series Category:1990s Canadian television series debuts Category:1994 Canadian television series debuts Category:1996 Canadian television series endings Category:1993 American television series debuts Category:1997 American television series endings Category:Animated adventure television series Category:American fantasy television series Category:Nickelodeon television series Category:French animated television series
title: The Busy World of Richard Scarry
